bio: Dedicated wide receiver with exceptional route-running ability and reliable hands. Known for clutch performances in high-pressure situations and strong academic achievement. Committed to excellence both on the field and in the classroom.

highlights.title: Season Highlights 2024
highlights.description: Best catches and touchdowns from senior season including game-winning TD vs. Central High

highlights.title: Combine Performance
highlights.description: 40-yard dash, vertical jump, and agility drills from regional combine

highlights.title: Championship Game
highlights.description: Key plays from state championship game - 8 receptions, 150 yards, 2 TDs

achievements.title: All-State First Team
achievements.detail: Selected for outstanding performance during 2024 season

achievements.title: Team Captain
achievements.detail: Elected by teammates and coaches for leadership qualities

achievements.title: Academic All-Conference
achievements.detail: Maintained 3.8+ GPA while excelling in athletics

achievements.title: Regional Combine MVP
achievements.detail: Top performer at Nike Regional Combine - Dallas

achievements.title: School Record Holder
achievements.detail: Most receiving yards in a single season (1,247 yards)

achievements.title: Playoff MVP
achievements.detail: Outstanding performance in state playoff run

coachQuote.text: Jordan is the most dedicated and talented receiver I've coached in 20 years. His work ethic, leadership, and clutch performances make him ready for the next level. Any college program would be lucky to have him.
coachQuote.author: Coach Mike Thompson
coachQuote.title: Head Coach, Lincoln High School
